mapper.insert: insert into shop_order_payments (payment_no, payment_type, payment_acc_no, payment_months, payment_amount, order_no) values (payments_seq.nextval, #{type}, #{accNo}, #{months}, #{amount}, #{order.no})
mapper.select: select payment_no as no, payment_type as type, payment_acc_no as accNo, payment_months as months, payment_amount as amount, payment_status as status, payment_updated_date as updatedDate, payment_created_date as createdDate from shop_order_payments where order_no = #{value}
